name: MissionBrick
description:
Your mission, should you choose to accept it is to navigate the tricky world of bricks. You have to battle the Kai, fight through the maze, dismiss the aliens and take on the big guns.

There are ten levels ranging in difficulty - how far can you get and what is your highest score? Leave a note in the comments and let us know how high you get.

CONTROLS

  • Click the left mouse button on the screen to start
  • Move the mouse to move the paddle
